name: STM32MP157F-DK2
description: A versatile dual ARM Cortex-A7 MPU from ST equipped to run Linux with impressive graphics capabilities and lots of IO.
shortDescription: STMicroelectronics MP1 processor devkit with touchscreen
getStartedInstructions:
1. Open the project folder and update the submodules: `git submodule update --init --recursive` 
2. Follow the guide in the [README](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lvgl/lv_port_linux/master/boards/stm32mp157f-dk/README.md)
